name: Nectar Flap
description:
Nectar Flap is a casual game that transforms you into a hummingbird. You will learn to flap your wings as fast as a hummingbird can (10-15 times per second). You will collect nectar from flowers and a hummingbird feeder.

Be careful, there are ants on the hummingbird feeder, a hungry cat, and wind to contend with.

Specifically designed and developed for the iOS devices as well as Apple TV and the Siri Remote.

Key Features
- Three hummingbirds to choose from
- Unlimited progressively difficult levels
- Nectar value system
- Health management
- Wind system and indicator
- In-App instructions
- A hungry cat

Follow us for the latest info and game news!
- http://www.three19.com/game-nectar-flap
